sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import CommonBanner from "../../common/banner/CommonBanner"; import Footer from "../../common/footer/Footer"; import Header from "../../common/header/Header"; import InfoSection from "../../common/infoSection/InfoSection"; class StaffAugmentation extends React.Component { render() { return ( <>
Staff Augmentation

BrainHR IT Solutions offers staff augmentation services to help organizations overcome staffing shortages and increase productivity. With a vast network of qualified IT professionals, BrainHR IT Solutions can provide skilled and experienced talent to supplement a client's existing team. Staff augmentation can be particularly useful for organizations facing rapid growth, special projects, or seasonal demands. In addition to IT staff augmentation, BrainHR IT Solutions also offers creative staffing solutions to help organizations with their marketing and design needs. With a network of skilled creative professionals, BrainHR IT Solutions can provide talent for entire Technology stacks like AWS, PEGA, Java, Devops, SAP, QA, .Net, Salesforce, Cloud Computing, Mobile Application Development, Cyber Security, Data Analytics, Automation & AI, Machine Learning, Robotics & RPA, ERP, CRM, CMS that deal with Front End, Back End, Testing, Middleware, Firmware, Cloud etc

Our IT staff augmentation and HR outsourcing services provide verified trusted, proven highly skilled talent and expertise; exponentially reduce risks, time and costs, and giving highest ROI. We work directly with hiring managers to understand your specific needs and provide only highly qualified individuals that can be on boarded quickly and add their multiple skill set value to the Organization. Even though this method facilities temporarily filling specialized roles that may be required for one project or business need without requiring a commitment to utilizing that skill set again in the future, it is often the case that our qualified & certified Consultants we give to you after thorough scrutinizing process through various parameters, contribute enormously in many ways to the Client Project overall, that they become indispensable to the Client and their future Project Requirement needs and often end up working Full time for extended Long Term projects and such will be the quality of Consultants we provide. Simply saying, you just need to give us requirement to sit back, relax and forget about the problem of Augmenting your staff for a particular requirement requiring specialized skill sets and within record Turnaround time, we will fulfil your needs with 100% satisfaction guaranteed.

For Staff Augmentation and Recruitment, BrainHR relies on a variety of tools, software, frameworks, and methodologies to ensure that the hiring process is efficient and effective. Some of the commonly used tools in recruitment include Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), which allow recruiters to manage job postings, resumes, and candidates' data. Examples of ATS software include Workable, Lever, and Greenhouse. Other software tools used in recruitment include LinkedIn Recruiter, Indeed, and ZipRecruiter, which enable recruiters to search for and contact potential candidates.

According to a report by Grand View Research, the global IT staff augmentation market size is expected to reach $60.7 billion by 2025, growing at a CAGR of 17.4%. Moreover, the report indicated that the increasing demand for specialized IT skills is one of the key drivers of the staff augmentation market. BrainHR IT Solutions can help organizations address this demand by providing specialized IT talent when and where they need it.

A report by Forrester projected that global marketing spend would reach $548.2 billion by 2024, with digital marketing accounting for over 50% of the spend. Moreover, the report indicated that the increasing complexity of marketing technology is driving demand for specialized marketing skills. By partnering with BrainHR IT Solutions for creative staffing, organizations can access top talent and stay competitive in the fast-changing marketing landscape.

); } } export default StaffAugmentation;
